message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I understand your offer, Bob, but I'm not willing to go that low. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we try $110?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $100?
I'm not willing to go down to $100, but I'm willing to make a slight concession. How about we try $105?
I'm still a bit above my budget, but I really like the product. Would you be willing to meet me at $102?
I'm still a bit hesitant to meet you at $102, but I'm willing to make another concession. How about we try $108?
I'm getting close to my budget, but I'm still a bit off. Would you be willing to meet me at $104?
I'm not willing to go up to $104, but I'm willing to make another small concession. How about we try $109?
I'm really close to my budget, but I'm not willing to go above $105. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
